column1: Powered by three 825hp Rolls - Royce Buzzard IIMS liquid - cooled, in - line engines, the Perth retained a number of features familiar to the Iris, but differed in having a hull shallower and less broad in the beam, this hull being covered by corrosion - resistant Alclad.
